body.name: Acer Iconia Tab P10 P10-11-K5P5 Tablet | 10.4" 2K 2000 x 1200 IPS Touch | MediaTek MT8183C Octa-Core CPU | 4GB LPDDR4 | 64GB eMMC | WiFi-5 | Front 5MP & Rear 8MP Webcam | Portfolio Case | Android 12
body.stockDetail: Only 12 left in stock (more on the way).
features: Big Screen & High Resolution – This 10.4” big screen tablet features 2K (2000 X 1200) resolution and a narrow bezel design that makes it easy to get comfortable and immerse yourself in a movie.
All-Day Battery - Up to 10.5 hours of video playback

Built to Perform - This Android 12 tablet lets you watch videos, save pictures, and play games with ease thanks to its MediaTek MT8183C Octa-Core processor, 4GB LPDDR4 of memory, 64GB eMMC storage, and a MicroSD slot.

App for Kids - Google Kids Space gives you and your child a safe place to explore quality content designed to help them learn and keep them engaged. Parents can also help manage the content, screen time, and more with the Family Link app.

Video Calls Made Easy - This tablet features a Front 5MP camera so that your video calls are always crystal clear. The 8MP Auto Focus rear camera also lets you take high-resolution pictures on-the-fly.

Take it Anywhere - This tablet’s aluminum alloy design keeps it thin and lightweight, measuring 7.8mm thin and weighing 0.97 pounds. In-Cell Touch Panel (iTP) technology also reduces display thickness while improving optical performance.
Wireless Technology - 802.11ac WiFi 5 (Dual-Band 2.4GHz and 5GHz) and Bluetooth 5.0
body.description: Sit down with your family and watch movies, read books, or play games together thanks to the Acer Iconia Tab P10’s large 10.4” display and 2K (2000 X 1200) resolution. Its thin and light design and long battery life make it easy to use at home or on the road. (NT.LFRAA.002)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Big Screen & High Resolution Watch movies whenever and wherever you want. This 10.4-inch big screen tablet features 2K (2000 X 1200) resolution and a narrow bezel design that makes it easy to get comfortable and immerse yourself in a movie.

Take it Anywhere This tablet’s aluminum alloy design keeps it thin and lightweight, measuring 7.8mm thin and weighing 0.97 pounds. In-Cell Touch Panel (iTP) technology also reduces display thickness while improving optical performance.

Built to Perform This Android 12 tablet lets you watch videos, save pictures, and play games with ease thanks to its MediaTek MT8183C Octa-Core processor, 4GB LPDDR4 of memory, 64 GB eMMC storage, and a MicroSD slot.

All-Day Battery Equipped with a 6,000mAh battery and a USB Type-C port for charging, this tablet gives you up to 10.5 hours of video playback so that you can take this tablet with you anywhere without worrying about running out of power

Video Calls Made Easy This tablet features dual-band Wi-Fi and an up to 5MP camera so that your video calls are always crystal clear. The 8MP Auto Focus rear camera also lets you take high-resolution pictures on-the-fly. App for Kids Google Kids Space gives you and your child a safe place to explore quality content designed to help them learn and keep them engaged. Parents can also help manage the content, screen time, and more with the Family Link app.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very reliable and a quality product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good tablet
reviews.reviewText: The 6gb RAM makes a huge difference and, for the price, it's surprising this tablet isn't more popular. It runs circles around other tablets I've had. Netflix and Hulu content is smooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's NOT top of the line...... but it's a pretty nice little tablet!
reviews.reviewText: At this price, with these hardware specs (and older version of Android), this is NOT a top of the line tablet... and while setting it up, I was ready to really dislike it. I had a few false starts on setup, some really long pauses during installs of various components, and other burps and hiccups...... and then, once I actually began to USE the tablet for what I wanted (web browsing, light gaming, social media) I found that it was really quite decent. Granted, you get into anything super RAM needy, or high res streaming video, and you might end up with some burps-- but for the nice "gentle" tablet uses, it does GREAT!I play games like Candy Crush, Angry BIrds, etc...... nothing like GTA or CPU/Console games (they'd likely kill this unit, LOL). My games, however, run really smoothly-- no problems. Honestly, I haven't really had any issues other than the occasional "I'm older tech, please bear with me" type of thing.If this is looking good to you, with all its specs (or lack thereof) and price, go for it. The only thing I'm not thrilled about is the older version of Android.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars no sim card slot
reviews.reviewText: Definitely recommend this tablet. The sound, brightness and colors of the screen, the size of the tablet please me and my daughter. The only thing is that there is no slot for a SIM card, it connects to any wi-fi that is at home or from the phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for intended use
reviews.reviewText: So far its been great for intended use of Internet and gaming. Runs most game apps fine except for large scale pc based games so not technically a gaming tablet but streams fine as well. Sturdy built. Great screen. Great sound. For under 150$ at time of purchase on sale, great little tablet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars iPad quality product
reviews.reviewText: The unit can keep up with latest games, smooth video, stereo audio. Cover clould be more premium but works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This tablet has noticeably better performance than some other lower-end (cheaper) tablets I've tried. This one is actually powerful enough for daily-use. The screen touch is very responsive and the resolution is great. It has decent power and performance for using multiple apps or higher-demanding apps.I don't really use the camera, but have used it for watching movies or shows on Amazon Prime, and it looks and sounds amazing! No slowness or buffering issues noticed.The build is very sturdy feeling, not cheap/plastic like most and doesn't feel like a toy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars ACER did it right, a great performing tablet at a good price
reviews.reviewText: Got this mainly for those longer airplane flights and layovers in airports, usually watch movies and play games on my phone, but my friend brought his tablet last time and it made a huge difference.This ASUS tablet performed better than I expected, large 10.4 inch screen, fast bootup, quick response time and the 2K graphics made my games and movies look awesome, bright, crisp and clear. I have a high end gaming PC at home, and I know the limitations of tablets and non-gamer laptops and computers, so I didn't expect it to be able to run the more demanding titles, however the less CPU intensive games ran perfectly and as mentioned looked awesome on the 2K display.For movies it rocked, the internal speakers are OK, but since I am at an airport or in a plane I used earbuds, and of course their sound was awesome, but if you're intending on using the internal speakers they do the job satisfactory. Battery life was very good, I was able to watch several full length movies without having to recharge it, and recharge also seemed pretty quick to full charge. It comes with 128GB internal storage, however I doubled that by simply adding a MicroSD card, so now I have 256GB, more than enough for my needs. The selling price was $249 when I ordered, a great performing tablet for that price.NOTE! The reason for 4 star review and not 5, I was unable to update the OS from Android 12 to 13, so the OS is about a year or more old, I am hoping ASUS comes out with a fix for that so I can update the OS, but so far Android 12 has been running great on it, so hopefully all will be OK either way.
What a great tablet does absolutely everything I need it too has great sound feels very solid would buy it again I have also showed a few friends who have bought it and enjoyed it

I do not have the luxury of returning this - I need it NOW for the class I am taking.So I will just plug it in all the time.Will query and ask ACER when I am done with it - it should be within the month of December 2023.Then I will update this review.
The picture quality is clear and bright.
